articles.author: Sebastian Kettley
articles.title: Space Race 2.0: China set to beat NASA to Mars by 20 years - US mission 'infeasible' - Daily Express
articles.description: THE SPACE RACE to Mars is on and China may be poised to reach the Red Planet nearly 20 years ahead of NASA, as experts warn the US space agency's targets are looking increasingly unlikely.

articles.title: AI creates 9 million new designer drugs - RT
articles.description: Scientists have used artificial intelligence to "predict" formulas for new designer drugs, with the stated goal of helping to improve their regulation. The AI generated formulas for nearly nine million potential new drugs.
